byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and AHMAD SHAKIB

abstract: Afghan officials report suicide bombing targeting security forces kills and wounds dozens at packed marketplace in northern Faryab province; says casualties were mostly civilians.
lead_paragraph: The attack took place in Almar, a district that has been the site of fierce fighting in recent months as the Taliban have extended a wave of violence north.

headline.main: Suicide Bombing at Afghan Market Kills Dozens
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Afghanistan: Market Attacked

snippet: The attack took place in Almar, a district that has been the site of fierce fighting in recent months as the Taliban have extended a wave of violence north.
